name: Taxapocalypse
description:
Don't you hate that you have to pay taxes ? What if you just didn't ? Um, that seems like a good idea... maybe.

Yeah, just don't pay them!

That's it, don't pay them! You'll earn money by not spending it! That's a genius plan! Nobody will ever find about it, right?

How to play

1. Grab the correct associated stamp. The papers have color coded areas, just like your stamps. How peculiar.

2. Put the stamp on the file.

3. That's it, you've commit... correctly filed your papers. Good job !

4. Continue until you're done. Wait, you're never done ? Oh...

Resources

Musics are from the Unity Asset Store. Don't ask me why I haven't let people rate me on music, I haven't done it.

All the 3D stuff is also Unity Asset Store. Free stuff is life.

Zalfos did the stamps and this magnificent game logo.

I hope you'll like this stupid game. I enjoyed creating it, especially because it's been a while. I really enjoy making dumb games, I should do some more.

Have fun :smile: 

PS : Btw my personal record is 66.

And also : There is a secret that is not very difficult to find
